title: About Me
text:
After 14 years working in the AEC* industry, I decide to change my career to Data Science.
Currently, I am enrolled in the Applied Data Science Degree at UOC University, I have a diversity of interests, from Machine Learning, Advanced Analytics, Cloud Computing, and DevOps, to Architecture, Sustainability, Circular Economy, Sports, and Cooking.
AEC, Architecture, Enginnering and Construction.

title: Winning Space Race with Data Science
text:
In this capstone, we will predict if the Falcon 9 first stage will land successfully.
SpaceX advertises Falcon 9 rocket launches on its website, with a cost of 62 million dollars; other providers cost upward of 165 million dollars each, much of the savings is because SpaceX can reuse the first stage. Therefore if we can determine if the first stage will land, we can determine the cost of a launch. This information can be used if an alternate company wants to bid against SpaceX for a rocket launch.
